There were no other sightings in Pomona on or around June 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI just was outside having a smoke. I noticed a bright star, it was not moving at first, then just slowly started moving north east. It just drifted silent over my house and continued in a North East direction. Totally silent, and not blinking.
